parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Object

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[vectorDir]] and [[vectorUp]] of the model used in 3D-[[Arma: GUI Configuration|Dialogs]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlModelDirAndUp''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]] - 3D control

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vectorDir]], [[vectorUp]]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vectorDirAndUp = [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]] _control3D;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]]
</value></part></template></root>
